title: DAO Master Meta‑Schema
description: Manifest that tells people and tools what every subschema in the offline‑first DAO stack does and how they inter‑relate.  This file is informational only; it is **not** a validation schema for instance data.

schemas.description: List of subschema descriptors in no particular order.

governs.description: Node, edge, or packet class governed.

linksTo.description: Other schema IDs referenced via $ref or logical relation.

schemas.title: Transmission Medium
schemas.purpose: Capabilities & tags for any communication carrier

schemas.title: Transport Layer
schemas.purpose: Defines logical transports (MC‑TCP/UDP/FEC)

schemas.title: Channel Adapter
schemas.purpose: Low‑level binding to a specific medium

schemas.title: Packet Header
schemas.purpose: 8‑byte common header for all transports

schemas.title: Project
schemas.purpose: Top‑level collaborative container

schemas.title: Task
schemas.purpose: Work unit inside a project

schemas.title: Funding Entry
schemas.purpose: Money or resources committed to a project

schemas.title: Contributor
schemas.purpose: Pseudonymous participant profile

schemas.title: Contributor Base
schemas.purpose: Abstract base schema for all contributor types

schemas.title: AI Contributor
schemas.purpose: AI agent that contributes to projects

schemas.title: DAO Contributor
schemas.purpose: Organization that contributes to projects

schemas.title: Human Contributor
schemas.purpose: Human individual that contributes to projects

schemas.title: Device
schemas.purpose: Hardware element bound to contributor

schemas.title: Experiment
schemas.purpose: Federated research experiment descriptor

schemas.title: Epoch Log Entry
schemas.purpose: Human‑time anchor for deltas

schemas.title: Project Delta
schemas.purpose: Signed diff bundle for offline sync

schemas.title: Graph Node Meta
schemas.purpose: Common header inherited by all node schemas

schemas.title: Graph Edge Meta
schemas.purpose: Generic edge descriptor

schemas.title: Physical Layer
schemas.purpose: Describes physical and electromagnetic properties of transmission media

schemas.title: Tool
schemas.purpose: Function-specific artifact used by devices or contributors for tasks

schemas.title: Training Dataset
schemas.purpose: Defines datasets used to train or fine-tune models with provenance and metadata

schemas.title: Storage Medium
schemas.purpose: Describes physical or virtual storage media with durability, security, and access control properties

schemas.title: Biological Entity
schemas.purpose: Base schema for all biological entities including animals, plants, and other organisms

schemas.title: Animal
schemas.purpose: Schema for animal biological entities, extending the base biological entity schema

schemas.title: Plant
schemas.purpose: Schema for plant biological entities, extending the base biological entity schema

schemas.title: Measurement
schemas.purpose: Generic measurement container for any quantifiable property

schemas.title: Base Measurement
schemas.purpose: Base schema for all physical measurements with unit, context and provenance

schemas.title: Spatial Measurement
schemas.purpose: Measurements related to physical dimensions and distances

schemas.title: Thermal Measurement
schemas.purpose: Temperature and heat-related measurements

schemas.title: Data Measurement
schemas.purpose: Measurements related to digital data quantities and rates

schemas.title: Power Measurement
schemas.purpose: Energy and power-related measurements

schemas.title: Electromagnetic Measurement
schemas.purpose: Measurements related to electromagnetic properties

schemas.title: Signal Measurement
schemas.purpose: Measurements related to signal processing and communication

schemas.title: Attachment
schemas.purpose: File or data attachment associated with other entities

schemas.title: Emotional State
schemas.purpose: Representation of emotional conditions or affect

schemas.title: Memory
schemas.purpose: Long-term memory storage for agents or systems

schemas.title: Psychological State
schemas.purpose: Cognitive and psychological conditions of agents

schemas.title: Telemetry Stream
schemas.purpose: Real-time data stream from devices or systems

schemas.title: Monitoring Rule
schemas.purpose: Rules for monitoring and alerting on system conditions

schemas.title: Visualization Config
schemas.purpose: Configuration for data visualization displays

schemas.title: Signature
schemas.purpose: Cryptographic signature verification information

schemas.title: Custody Event
schemas.purpose: Cryptographically signed, timestamped event representing a change in custody or state of a resource or asset

schemas.title: Resource
schemas.purpose: Schema for modeling physical, renewable, and abstract resources with supply chain provenance, sustainability metrics, and lifecycle characteristics

schemas.title: Material Resource
schemas.purpose: Schema for physical material resources like raw minerals, metals, and manufactured components with detailed physical properties

schemas.title: Energy Resource
schemas.purpose: Schema for energy-related resources including renewable and non-renewable sources

schemas.title: Computational Resource
schemas.purpose: Schema for abstract computational resources such as compute time, bandwidth, storage capacity, and tokens
